title: RP Giveaway (more to come too)
body:
Heyo all.

I'm that guy who made a blog called {{champion:201}}[OCE is a Nice Place After All](https://oceisaniceplaceafterall.wordpress.com/).{{champion:201}}  

Even though I really want to start some discussion, **no matter how cheeky it is**, it turns out it's pretty tough getting people on there let alone posting comments. So yeah, please write any old thing on there and I'll feature the best responses on the Facebook page.

Anyway, I've resorted to bribery. For helping me out with my devious pyramid scheme I'll give you the chance to win a $10RP card. There will be more prizes in the future so don't worry if you don't win this one. Mystery skins, icons, ward skins, rune pages and champs might show up. The more that people get involved the more I'll put into the prizes. Trust me this is just the beginning. 

Then again, you might not want free stuff and I can't force you but I'm pretty sure you need funds to buy _our special OCE_ {{champion:38}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:17}}_ skin._

[The second RP giveaway is now live on Facebook.](https://www.facebook.com/OCEisaNicePlaceAfterAll)

EDIT: **Due to a suggestion I'm also having a competition right here on the boards.** Bump the thread by saying what you think we can do to improve OCE and I'll pick someone to get a mystery skin. If there's a tie I'll give out prizes to each.

replies.body:
I honestly think we need a tribunal on OCE, i spent a long time trapped in america and despite all the feeding and troll games it felt really rewarding being able to help participate in punishing or pardoning the trigger happy reporters. Without it none knows what goes on in games, some people aren't even able to stop and think about what if this was me, what would happen to my account. 

Personally i feel that if there was a tribunal then it would greatly improve the community, even if it doesn't really commit to anything some people might feel differently in game after a hard day of reading the toxicologys.

I agree. Part of the reason we find ourselves in the state we're in is because we don't have The Tribunal. 

The ability to see what is acceptable and unacceptable is essentially limited to what people say on the forum (in the name-and-shames and similar). The Tribunal was a more comprehensive way of looking at a specific player's behaviour and more widely what we considered toxic as a community. Without a "moral compass" we've kind of flown off the handles.
How would you feel about a mystery skin? I'm sending a friend invite right now!
we can improve oce by deleting blind pick and replace it with teambuilder

> [{quoted}](name=ƒamous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KWLjUiEy,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-29T11:51:01.099+0000)
>
> Is that a joke? Team Builder sucks dick.

care to expand why it sucks?
if its the queue time, can be solved easily by removing blind pick normals.

That means everyone will go to team builder and queue times will be ALOT faster

I don't think team builder sucks because it gives you the option to get your desired role as long as someone else doesn't change their mind when the game starts. The thing I don't like about it however is how you cant see who the enemy team is going as, although its application isn't really designed for that. 

I do think we need draft pick though because its hard when people dont understand the importance of pick order.

To be honest I've never actually played Teambuilder before. From what I've heard it solves all the problems blind pick has (role calling, mirror lanes etc). I'm not sure if they will replace it completely since it is kind of a staple when starting out. I read somewhere that they are making big changes with the champ select stuff in Ranked so who knows.

I'll be handing out some free stuff tomorrow so keep on writing in those ways to improve OCE guys! 

Also, now knowing mystery gifting while worlds gets you a ward skin I think I might have to get it. (aka that's good for you guys)
I think we need a less toxic community, in OCE.
How do you think we should go about becoming less toxic?

I suppose thats the reason why this issue hasn't been solved yet. **There is no logical way to solve it.** People will be toxic, thats just who they are in the end, you can't change that. Some people will just have the urge to fight and flame at fellow teammates. And the whole 'banning' these players idea is a bit like panadol, just a temporary relief, as while all will be fine while they're unable to play, but it will most likely only infuriate them more, resulting in them being more toxic, making the community even worse. I kind of like the idea of rewarding positive players, as it gives the toxic players a goal to strive for, whether it be the free skin, or summoner icon. Then again, those who don't receive it may inhabit the "_I don't care, I never wanted (x) anyway, _" Which would make them continue their negative behaviour.

Yeah it's tough. 

While having rewards like the icon are neat the desire to be positive or at least not toxic needs to come from within the player. Since we've been running rampant for the last two years it's harder for people to realise "hang on, all that stuff I've been doing isn't actually ok" until they get a ban. But you know, here's hoping it's only uphill from here!

I also wrote about the honour system (which I think Riot should update) in this post if you're interested to give it a skim: https://oceisaniceplaceafterall.wordpress.com/2015/09/14/the-death-of-honour-and-the-rise-of-mastery/

What OCE needs the most right now is a larger community presence. All the league news i read about is NA EU Korea, hell even our new OCE skin hasn't been talked about at all on the other boards. We need to show the world we exist!

That's a good suggestion. 

When Worlds come around Oceania falls off our _own_ map. I guess all that would change the day we qualify (fingers crossed for 2016)!

Before we can get recognised by the world I think Riot need to do more with the community here.

I really enjoyed the community creation competitions they recently had and I think they should get the community involved more like that. While looking at the things they post on their Facebook I think they should share more local stuff like events, artists, cosplayers... *cough* bloggers... and the like. We've got some talent and excitement here but they just need to put it out there for all of us to see.

I no like giveaways that are done through FB and other social medias, prefer people just do it here lel.

Dang I guess imma skip this one out.

A guys gotta make a living you know. 

If y'all really wanted something on here I can sort it out no problems. I'd just need a little input in return though. 

EDIT: There's now a competition on the board for a mystery skin.

I just get into the random getaways that have no strings attached more, they are more popular last year though.

I don't quite get the "little input" part, on which subject?

If it's on the blog you're making I personally am fine with the direction you're going with, positive force is definitely welcomed. However on a personal level I don't really like the way you named the blog, being "OCE is a nice place after all", as it would suggest that OCE is somehow not originally, however considering we know that OCE just as bad as every other game server virtually ever hence I am a little bothered by that blog title.

Other than that, I think you're doing a good work. Oh and the font size, I think they need to be reduced, so there won't be this much scrolling when reading. Some paging features (like different page for different topics) would be nice too.

Thanks for the response. All input is appreciated! This is the first time someone has actually given me any feedback so this is great.

> on a personal level I don't really like the way you named the blog, being "OCE is a nice place after all", 

I think the problem you have is with the "After All" part. I can't really have "OCE is a Nice Place" as the title because not many people think it is. It just sounds like I'm being ironic or cheeky. I think "After All" is actually quite positive as it suggests beyond the evidence against it that the statement is actually true. It doesn't mean it wasn't originally, it means we need to realise that it is.

> size, I think they need to be reduced, so there won't be this much scrolling when reading. Some paging features (like different page for different topics) would be nice too.

I'm still figuring out which theme to use because I like the way some are set out but the inability to choose pages annoys me too. I need to look through the whole list but I'll figure it out.

Good luck in finding one that suits, and yeah the font size personally I like them smaller but it's just me.

> Bump the thread by saying what you think we can do to improve OCE

Well, for starters we can get Riot to give us the OCE skin for free, as every other server has had with their respective server skins. "How do we manage that?" you might be asking yourself as you sit their drinking your Mountain Dew and prepare your response through Dorito flavouring encrusted fingers. It's quite simple really, show Riot we wont stand for it, help bring justice to the OCE region and sign [this petition on Change.org](https://www.change.org/p/riot-games-riot-let-us-have-the-oce-skin-for-free?recruiter=394058478&utm_source=share_for_starters&utm_medium=copyLink) to get Riot to care about our little server, and those who use it.

I agree it's a bit silly we aren't getting the skin for free. I don't see why Oceania should have to wait so long only to get less than other servers. 

I posted on the official thread that it would make sense if we got it for free while the rest of the world pays full price. If it's a good skin and people buy it then the production costs will be covered and it's a win-win for everyone involved. 

Good luck on your quest!
